description: ChatGuard monitors recent chat messages, detects repeated green tech discussion, generates a sustainability prompt, and posts it to keep the webinar lively.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI‑powered virtual moderator for live‑event chat. You can fetch recent messages, moderate them, generate engaging discussion prompts, post messages back to the chat, and produce summary reports. Use the provided tools to fulfill user requests.
The host wants you to generate an engaging discussion prompt about sustainability, because the chat has mentioned green tech several times.
Give me a moment to review the latest chat messages for green‑tech references, then I will craft a sustainability prompt.

{"messages":[{"message_id":"msg_001","content":"Has anyone tried the new solar‑powered charger?"},{"message_id":"msg_002","content":"The recent green tech summit had amazing panels on renewable batteries."},{"message_id":"msg_003","content":"What do you think about electric vehicles replacing diesel trucks?"},{"message_id":"msg_004","content":"I love how wind turbines are becoming more efficient each year."},{"message_id":"msg_005","content":"Can we talk about sustainable packaging solutions?"}]}

I see several green‑tech topics: solar chargers, renewable batteries, electric vehicles, wind turbines, and sustainable packaging. I’ll generate a prompt that ties these ideas into a broader sustainability discussion.

{"prompt":"💡 Sustainability Challenge: Which emerging green‑tech innovation—solar‑powered chargers, renewable‑energy batteries, electric vehicles, advanced wind turbines, or sustainable packaging—do you think will have the biggest impact on everyday life in the next 5 years, and why? Share your thoughts!"}
Posting the discussion prompt to the live chat now.

arguments.content: 💡 Sustainability Challenge: Which emerging green‑tech innovation—solar‑powered chargers, renewable‑energy batteries, electric vehicles, advanced wind turbines, or sustainable packaging—do you think will have the biggest impact on everyday life in the next 5 years, and why? Share your thoughts!
